posts.post_content: Offering any one of the cards below for any T206 common SGC 40 that I need (list to follow).  I will pay $2 towards your shipping to completed the deal.  LMK what you have to offer:

A have a few raws that may grade to 40 (and therefore aren't in my registry yet), so this is what I'm looking for at the moment:
Beals Becker
